title: How do you have fun in League?
body:
When I want to just jack around and not care about anything, I play Hecarim Dominion.

Otherwise, I play:
Zed/Hecarim top
Rumble/Renekton jungle
Xerath/Sivir mid
adcs are adcs, not much mixmatching there....
Orianna/Vi support

I'm not asking if you "break the meta" or pick off-champs, all I'm asking is, "How do you have fun?"
